name: addiction (jamesbgamesb)
description:
Top-down shoot 'em up focusing on the issue of gambling addiction.

You have $2200 in bills due at the end of the month.  Bet money on your arcade skills to try to make enough money to pay your bills. If you win, you could score big! If you lose, you could fall into major debt...

This game was made as a school project, but I am still super proud of it. This is my first legit game that I have made by myself, so any feedback is appreciated. I hope to continue making more games in the future.

Thanks to Matt Guptill for the music: 

https://linktr.ee/Fire.in.the.Woods?fbclid=PAAaadH30Y1knDXytGfp3L1rqHvQ4Nj9gIusz...
